name: Cafe "Venus Flytrap"
description:
You're a fly. A fly whose hobbies consist of writing novels and eating sweets.
Once day you decide to check out a new cute cafe, that promises abundance of pastries, sweets and drinks. A cafe that is run by adorable froggos.

There are two main endings.

This game was made in RPG Maker 2k3 for "Sweet to Sour" game jam, 2023.

Check the .txt files in the zip folder for content warnings, policies, terms of use and credits.

Special thanks to my mum for being the tester/provider of ideas for the dialogues.
